website_summaries.verdict: At about half the cost of some other styles and done in a soft, high quality bamboo fabric blend, these stand out for being a good value for the price.
pros: These pajamas get high praise from consumers for the feel and quality of the fabric
Comfortable, very soft, and cool, it is an easy care set that can be machine washed and holds up well even through multiple washings
cons: Some felt the design was a bit too boxy, and it tends to run small
The colors were also less vibrant than some other brands

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife!
customer_reviews.text: Due to a stroke, my wife suffers from dementia. It can be challenging to keep her happy, but on a hunch, I decided to pick up a pair of these pajamas to brighten her day. They immediately became her favorites. So much so, that she is elated every time they are laundered and ready to wear again. So I bought another pair. Now, at three pairs later, she is still excited for pajama time every night. These are well made "jammies" that have brought a little bit of sunshine to a sad situation. Thank you for making my wife smile!
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 at 150 lbs, bigger build through my hips/legs, and I ordered a Medium. Love this set! It is so comfortable and soft with just the right amount of stretch. Fabric feels cool to the touch and they have great color selections. Will order again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: mkobra5

customer_reviews.title: Boxy shape; nice material
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft and cool, but the shape is boxy. Depending on your shape, this may or may not work for you. If you look closely at the image for this product, you can see that the top is cut straight down from the shoulders. Also, the shorts are low waisted with big legs. Although my day clothes are size 8-10, the large size in these are snug in the bust and hips on the shirt; and the waist and rear of the shorts. The shoulders and legs have ample room. I'm going to snip the elastic in the waist to make these work for me.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these 10 minutes ago and already ordered another pair! They're incredibly soft and comfortable. The material had a nice amount of stretch without being as sloppy and easily stretched out shape the way some viscose fabrics are. I am 5'7" 230lbs and normally wear a 26 or 28 top and an 18 or 20 bottom. I got a 3X because I'd rather the bottom be loose than the top too tight. The top fits great with a little extra room and the bottoms are pretty big. They stay up but I might add a quick drawstring to the waist for added security. For the price I'm pretty impressed by the quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kayley Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful PJ's, but run small.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful pajamas, and I love the feel of them. They actually feel slightly cool against your skin, so great for people who get warm at night. The only complaint I have, like some others, is the sizing. They definately run small.
customer_reviews.author: lisa d

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware if 3rd Party Seller
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas as long as they are the true Latuza brand. However be aware that if you order them from a third party shipper called Azunlers- they will not be the Latuza brand. They will run a lot smaller, not be made of bamboo, have a tag that calls for professional dry cleaning only. And they will take over 2 weeks to arrive because they are shipped from China. If you receive the true Latuza brand...these are very comfy and a great find. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingWoman

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed that the day after I receive these pajamas a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that the day after I receive these pajamas a hole appears in the front of the top. These were very comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pajama set will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this pajama set its super comfy, cozy and super cooling. I'm a very hot sleeper and this pajama set keeps me comfortable. I chose size medium, I typically fit a medium top and bottom. The medium fit me perfectly. I'm 5'10" about 145 pounds, measurements- 36 bust, 27 waist and 39 inch hip. Tee shirt measurements when laid flat- 19" wide, 24 " long. Shorts measure 14" across the elastic waist and stretch to 21" wide maximum stretch. Shorts are 14" long from top to bottom with 3" inseam length.
customer_reviews.author: Linsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of trim is awful.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these because they are soft and very comfortable to sleep it. Keeps ya cool, keeps ya warm. Better than cotton. HOWEVER, the satin edging is as cheap as it comes. Do not give as a gift. These have been washed maybe 2-3 times and look at the satin. I wish they would stop using cheap trim. Not worth $25 if in a few washings they look like this.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy I love setters

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Breathable and Soft Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I wake up warm at night so I was looking for breathable, lightweight pajamas. These are great! Well made and so soft! I normally wear a small (5'3" 120 lbs) but decided to size up because I like my clothing loose when I sleep. Though they are loose, they fit just fine and don't look too big. I love the way the medium fits me in look and feel. I bought two more pairs for my teenage daughter and another pair with capri bottoms for colder nights. Extremely happy with this product. And, the price is very good, as well. I have chocolate, light pink and grey. All are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Nauseatingly Nautical

customer_reviews.title: like holes are about to begin
customer_reviews.text: Rating poorly because product did not hold up after washing (cold water, gentle cycle). Several spots on the front of the shirt wore very thin, like holes are about to begin. Disappointed. Wore twice, washed once (alone).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up
customer_reviews.text: these are so very comfy! I decided to order up a size to a medium based on other reviews, but wish I hadn't. I'm 5'6" and 130 lbs and the shorts are almost too big... look a bit granny like. Order your usual size, they don't shrink. Otherwise these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Leila McAllister

customer_reviews.title: No more night sweats!
customer_reviews.text: These pjs are awesome! I have a health problem with regulating my temperature, and constantly have night sweats. This is the first time in months/ probably almost a year that I haven't woken up covered in sweat! Thank you so much! I am buying every color! As far as sizing, I am 5'4" 135 lbs, with a small bust and a belly and medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFULLY SOFT AND COMFORTABLE WITH ONE CAVEAT
customer_reviews.text: If I had to guess, and I do, these pajamas are made of ulta-soft bamboo viscose. There is no label listing the material and country of origin. Ergo, it's very likely china. They are very lightweight but, the eggplant color, is not see through. The sole label sown into the longitudinal seam at the bottom of the shirt states: DO NOT TUMBLE DRY. That's not a deal breaker for me because, I suspect that this outfit would dry in 10 minutes or less on a sunny day. For other prospective purchasers, this may be a deal breaker as putting them in the dryer may produce a large number of irritating lint balls.
customer_reviews.author: Maté Afficionado

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but odd sizing
customer_reviews.text: The material of these pjs is 💯 and very comfortable. Love the silk look around the collar and hem of the shorts. I got the Boysenberry color -it is very pretty. My only note is that I got an XL to be safe (I wear a size 12 in pants) and I got nervous when I put the shirt on. It is a little snug. My body type is larger on the bottom half, so I figured if the top was snug, the bottoms would be too small. The bottoms were big! I wish the shirt were a little larger and the bottoms a little smaller. But overall they are still great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: A must buy - good quality workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 sets for Christmas presents for teenaged girls. Always searching for nice itensthat ate age appropriate, mraning, not on the sexy side. They are both very well designed and made. The packaging is exceptional. Definitely looks and feels expensive. My daughter has told me she loves it several times. Very happy and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joswen E.

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT, COMFORT, COMFORT.
customer_reviews.text: They feel really nice. The top is short and the bottoms are huge. Typical off sizing. Kind of disappointing but keeping becuz of material. BUT.....I just woke up and had to change my review. Im ordering another set. THESE ARE THE MOST COMFORTABLE PAJAMAS I HAVE EVER HAD AND IM 57.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not sexy - fits like grandma pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Not sexy - fits like grandma pajamas. This set would be perfect returning home after having a baby or if you are recovering from some procedure where you just want cute comfort in a bright color. It is not cut or designed to accentuate your form. If you’re on your period - this is a great set. You could probably hide a pad wth no problem. Here’s one plus - it washes well, holds it’s shape, and is well made. It doesn’t look cheap at all. Extremely soft - almost like Gap Body cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Kornegayhodges

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are really great! They are super soft and light weight yet cozy. The V neck is just the right cut I don't have any problems with spillage while sleeping without a bra on. I have multiple sets. I think they would also make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Tamaia

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical/plastic odor upon drying in dryer
customer_reviews.text: After initial washing and it was in the dryer it emitted a horribly strong plastic/chemical odor. I worried that it would possible be carcinogenic via skin absorption so I returned it. I received a prompt refund. Color was very pretty and it was soft but I don't trust items made in China that emit a strong chemical odor.
customer_reviews.author: B. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: awesome sleep wear but like others, size is a bit off.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these yesterday and tried them last night and I must say I was impressed how cool they kept me. The materials are cool to touch and they came out without shrinkage after a wash in cold water - there are no washing instructions which was weird. As for the sizing, as many have stated the sizes are a bit off, the shirt is a 2X roomy and fits really well but the bottoms are definitely not a 2X. They look to be a large and are still workable but would definitely would be better if they were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Maritas

customer_reviews.title: Read for specific tips on selecting a fit!
customer_reviews.text: Runs big. Shorts are very high-waisted. No tag to distinguish front from back on shorts, which drives me crazy. Satin trim is nice and looks classy. Fabric feels good and the set is well-made, high quality, durable. I wear a size 10 pants and size 6-8 top. I am 150 pounds and 5’7” with a pear shape and full thighs. I bought the medium and both top and bottom are a bit big on me. However, I prefer a loose fit for sleepwear. I machine wash and air dry as recommended. A great set overall!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Howard

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: After years of sleeping in any old T-shirt, I decided to get myself some actual pajamas. These are really nice. They're comfortable, fit well, cool for sleeping on hot nights, but sufficiently modest to not absolutely require a bathrobe when walking out to the bathroom or whatever. The color is flattering and the trim is smooth and soft. I'm going to order another set with longer length bottoms for the cool weather.
customer_reviews.author: MyLikeIt

customer_reviews.title: Best pajamas ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours researching a pair of pajamas that would make me comfortable because I am having horrible night sweats and have been for a year and a half. I ordered these pajamas a few days ago and they are the softest most comfortable pajamas. I haven’t felt any sweat on my body and have slept like a rock in the last couple days! I bought the short sleeve and shorts pajama set and absolutely can’t tell you how much I love these! I will be getting more when it becomes winter! So thankful for these pajamas and giving me a great nights rest finally!❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Best nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: On my, these are the best! I would have never bought these if I would have seen them in the store. They are so comfortable and the best part is I did not wake up in the middle of the night sweating, they really do keep you cool. I did size up and I am glad I did they fit perfectly with wiggle room for sleeping. They washed up nice, I used Dead Downwind detergent, no softener and hung them dry. The colors are pretty and I am happy with the current choices. I now have 3 sets and ready to order another.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Soft and comfortable beyond imagining. Just enough to keep body temp. constant. Loved it so much the first night, I bought another set this morning. I could live in these. And no, they are not too thin (for me), and yes, they fit as expected...like, perfectly!! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Nila B. Hagood

customer_reviews.title: So soft! Definitely buy a set!
customer_reviews.text: I angsted over buying PJs from Amazon but could not locate anything local or at any other website that wasn’t what I was looking for - most were so ugly or old lady looking I just couldn’t justify my purchase. I was wary, but I bought these. Like the other reviewers said, just buy your typical size and they’ll fit. I am so happy it bought these! Not only are they flattering, the fabric is sooo soft! I hate getting tangled in my PJs at night but these have excellent stretch allowing me to sleep all night without waking up to untangle myself. Very much worth the price- I’m looking to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Snugharbor

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: 5'3", 100 lbs, size small fits great. Really surprised by how soft and comfortable these were for the low prixe point. The waist stays up nicely without digging in, and the light pink is also a really pretty color. Also wash well. So comfy for lounging. I suffer from night sweats and these keep me pretty cool throughout the night. Will be ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: These pajamas are so comfortable, I am wearing them now writing this
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are so comfortable, I am wearing them now writing this! I had read that they ran small so I ordered a size up. They are big on me and if I order another pair I will buy a size down. They keep my very cool at night(I get hot easily) and are extremely soft. I usually just wear mismatched tshirts and shorts and pants to bed but wanted an actual set of pajamas. I ordered an xxl, I am about 5'3 and weight around 190 lbs and I could easily fit into an xl seeing how big the xxl is on me.
customer_reviews.author: Allison L. Heaton

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with these pajamas! I bought them for my best friend/roommate as a birthday gift and a pair for myself as well, and we wear them all the time! She’s thin but tall, so I got her a large and they fit great! I’m about 5’4 and curvy, and I got a 2XL(they’re pretty big- I should’ve gotten an XL, but I prefer them to be baggier so I don’t mind). Super comfortable/soft, and the colors are so bright/vibrant (she has the purple and I have the brick red). We convinced our other friends to buy them, and they love them too! Totally recommended! Treat yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: fits oddly
customer_reviews.text: I bought several sets of these but wish I had only gotten 1. The fabric is great, very soft and a little stretchy. On first try on the shorts were a bit big but I could just fix the problem by rolling the band up, no problem and the top was already a little on the small side but manageable. The problem is after 1 wash the tops shrank a little but the shorts didn't seem to. So I'm stick with a PJ set with big shorts and little tops. I looks ridiculous. I am so disappointed bc I really love the feel of this fabric and all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best PJ’s EVER!!!!!!!  ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big believer in PJ’s need to be soft and comfortable. And these are amazing!!!!! I’m normally at 3xl or a 24/26 some where in that size range and they are true to size but like all plus sizes a little big in the front and a little short in the back of the shorts. But there PJ’s so an inch is nothing when they are so comfortable that during Covid19 lock down they are so cute you can just wear them all day lol. And toss on shoes and a bra to go to the grocery store or to the gas station.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eshelman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these PJs. My body temperature gets very high when I’m sleeping, and I often wake up drenched in sweat! These solved this problem. They are very soft, and super comfortable. And, best of all, they do as advertised. They keep me cool and dry all night long. I have already bought 3 more pairs. I also think they’re sort of cute. I find the bottoms to be a little bit big, but I just roll them up around the waist. The trim adds just a little touch 💁‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PJs!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are super comfy, true to size, the color is pretty, and it's a great price! I like that the material isn't so thin that you can see through it like some sleepwear. One downside is that you can't throw them in dryer after washing -- they need to be hung to dry, but I like these enough that it's not stopping me giving them 5 stars or ordering another pair!
customer_reviews.author: P. Pete

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!  Fits tall women well, very flattering on, silky, awesome fabric for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I love these pjs!!! The green is very pretty. It fits tall, busty women well (I'm 5'10" avg weight 38D). Nothing is too short or too tight. Fabric is so silky and comfy! Washed well (I washed separately on hand wash cold cycle and hung dry).
customer_reviews.author: MaryMary sometimescontrary

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually believe reviews that speak about "how it feels while you sleep" - because, really, when you sleep you don't feel, right? Also, don't usually like to spend this much on a pajama. BUT, this honestly is the most comfortable material I have ever slept in. The surface looks smooth and soft after a few washes, it feels good against my skin, and looks lovely with the champagne trim on the dark grey surface. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: OTtraveller

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: The fabric of these pj's felt great. I normally like my pj's roomy so that they don't bind as I roll around at night and so they aren't too revealing up top. With that in mind, I order a 2X (I normally wear an XL). The top was perfect. The bottoms, however, could have held 3 of me. And they were so long - past my knees! Not for me!
customer_reviews.author: Supermom

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, pills a little on the backs of the legs on the silky band
customer_reviews.text: This is SO soft. I love that. The only downsides are that the silky band on the shorts starts to pill on the backs of the legs. It’s not a big deal to me, I mean, they’re pajamas, but some people might care. I wish they came with a different color of accent fabric. This tan, or whatever it is, does not go with the beautiful berry.
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: Softest fabric ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this extremely soft and comfortable fabric. I ordered up one size as I like loose fit. Fits great and This is a comfortable nice style. Liked so much I ordered another pair same day as well as one pair of the lounge pants. Never had bamboo fabric but am so glad I decided to buy it. Softest most comfortable p.j.s ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane

customer_reviews.title: Top is best
customer_reviews.text: Love the top and could even wear it out without it being noticeably pajamas. The shorts are a slightly awkward length and not my favorite while pregnant (first trimester with weight loss not gain this time). The material is soft , they're attractive, and easy to wash/care for. Overall, the top is better than the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite pajamas! I love that material and the cut. I can't stand tshirts and it's winter so tanks were getting cold. A v neck short set is perfect. I sleep hot all the time, i paid extra for mattresses and sheets and still sleep hot. First night I wore these I accidentally left the heat vent right above me open and woke up sweaty (direct heat). Second I closed the vent I felt this material wicking away the moisture. I was immediately comfortable and didn't feel damp. Best cooling aid I've purchased. I'll likely be getting another set
customer_reviews.author: StormyMorning

customer_reviews.title: Silky and comfortable, great for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in light gray and liked it so much that I bought the dark gray set, too. It fits perfectly, not too tight, not too loose. The fabric is breathable and comfortable, light and silky. It's great for hot weather. It also looks pretty good, and even though that isn't the top priority for pajamas, my husband does have to see me in them and I wear pajamas quite a lot! I will bookmark these and buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Soft silky feel in comfy modest jammies.
customer_reviews.text: Love the silky soft drape if these comfy jammies. The top fits great but the bottoms were a tad too big although wouldn’t fall down or anything like that. The top would even work as street wear if I wore a bra underneath. These are thin but just this side of see-through so work great for modesty in my college dorm situation. They aren’t too hot to sleep in either. Very happy with my choice. I bought more but in the next size down. Either will work, though.
customer_reviews.author: MrsPsp

customer_reviews.title: Comfy summer pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These are such comfy summer pajamas! The fabric is so soft you feel like you're wearing nothing. I typically wear a size 4-6, and bought a medium size because I like roomy 'jams. The loose fit is exactly what I wanted. The colors are vibrant and lose nothing in the wash--although, to be fair, I hang these to dry because the heat of a dryer really strips color out of clothing in too many cases. They dry so quickly, this is not a problem. I own two sets now, and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia P

customer_reviews.title: Insane sizing
customer_reviews.text: I can only believe there was some kind of manufacturing or labeling error during production of these pajamas. The top was comfortable but, I would guess, about a size smaller than I expected for what I ordered. And the bottoms were at least 2, possibly 3, sizes larger than I expected. The shorts are so comically large it's hard to describe how much they don’t fit. Because of the mismatched sizes of top and bottom, I have no recommendation for someone who wants to order a set. It’s a shame, as the fabric is actually quite comfortable, and I would want to reorder them if I had any idea what to do.
customer_reviews.author: M. T. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible night sweats and these do help. They're cozy too. I'm 5'9" 165lbs and normally wear a 12 and bought a large. They're kind of baggy, but I like my PJs that way. If I wanted them more form fitting I probably could go with a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Cherienc

customer_reviews.title: What’s that smell????!!
customer_reviews.text: These pjs would get all 5 stars if it weren’t for the awful smell of the fabric. I couldn’t wear them until I soaked them in vinegar, rewashed them, put lavender essential oils on a drier sheet—-3 different times. Now they are quite comfy. I got an XL in the magenta ones because people said they ran small. This was not my experience. Size Large for me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey, 64 years old using Eminence products

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye night sweats!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these pajamas and just ordered 2 more. After months of waking up in the middle of the night to dry off because of night sweats she no longer has that problem. These pajamas are very soft and comfortable. She is 5'4 and 130 pds and got a medium. The bottoms are baggy but she liked how the top fit so she ordered more mediums. If you have problems with getting too warm at night please give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Pajamas Ever
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are AWESOME. I tend to sleep on the warm side and have always had issues waking up hot but after buying these pajamas I no longer have issues. I have worn regular pajama shorts and tanks but for whatever reason the fabric in these pajamas keep me cool. I will definitely be buying a second pair and it’s 100% worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and the price is right for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft. The top is my only complaint. I feel it is boxy and square and could be longer but otherwise no issues. I like that the shorts have some decent but not too much length to them- not booty shorts and not capris. I like that. I will definitely be ordering more. Nice to find cute, fair priced- solid colored pajamas for the XL-3XL size range that don’t look like 1975 table cloths or have stupid messages like “awake before my cats” “#naptime”
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love them, they work, get 1 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the reviews were right about the size. Order one size smaller than you normally would. At 5'9" 200 lbs., I would've ordered a L normally, but decided on a M based off reviews and it fits perfectly. These are also the first pj's I've gotten that truly do keep me cool in my, most likely, perimenopausal state. The wicking must work because if I am still sweating at night, I have not woken up wet at all. I've tried cotton, rayon, polyester, and even wearing nothing, but would still sweat throughout the night. I'm going to look for & order this same brands capris so that more of my legs are covered.
customer_reviews.author: Matt-LoLo

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of PJs, especially if you get hot flashes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best set of PJs, I just love them! I like my PJs roomy and I think these shrink a bit over time, so I get a medium instead of small. They’re sooo comfortable, they’re stretchy, cute and comfortable. I own them in 5 colors now. Still a great price and you’ll remain cool in these if you get hot flashes. Give them as gifts, people will think you spent more than you did. Excellent PJs!
customer_reviews.author: K. Morrissey

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised that all the 5 star reviews are warranted. These pajamas are made well, true to size, are extremely soft and comfortable and worth every penny I paid for them. I purchased the soft light pink, and the color is as advertised. Tonight, I purchased another pain, in light green color. I will remember these for gifting too, they are that nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the style or material
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the style or material. Amazon needs to start putting packing slips in with the orders. This is the way I felt about all 5 sets of pj’s that I ordered. With Amazon not putting packing slips it makes it more difficult to send merchandise back.
customer_reviews.author: Yamma

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice PJ's-Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these PJ's !!! They are so soft and light. They are not see through, but not a thick material and will make for cool sleep. The material is lovely, soft and luxurious. I normally wear a L-XL and I ordered an XL in these and they fit perfectly. I am definitely going to shop for more Latuza products. Thanks for making such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: TMAC TexasTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable but with questionable fit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the soft material, the top fits well, a little smaller than I hoped, but the bottoms are huge. If I wear them at my natural waistline, they hang down to my knees (I’m 5’6”). For the set to look good, I have to pull the waist of the shorts up to under my breasts. If I could have purchased the pieces individually, I would have gotten the top a size larger and the bottoms 3 sizes smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfy but Wine Red trim is Beige
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel of the fabric and the fit. I got the Wine Red set and I did not grasp from the listing that the trim is a beige color. I hate beige. I had thought the trim color was white, and to my eyes, white would be much more attractive. So, deducting one star for the trim color which I concede is semi-clear from the ad for this product.
customer_reviews.author: g3 from the UP

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, breathable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. She is normally a medium and it is true to size. Bust 38, waist 30, and I think hip around 35, 135 lbs, 5'4". Fits very well, not tight and not loose, but loose enough to be comfortable. Washes well, but hang dry is best.
customer_reviews.author: Tzu Lover 23

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! So soft, the satin like trim is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the feel of these pajamas. I will definitely be purchasing again. They fit true to size, are so soft (think knock off PJ Harlow) and are a really great value for the price. I have the light pink shorts set in a size large and love them! The trim is almost satin like and really adds a nice touch that makes them look higher end.
customer_reviews.author: T & M Sisson

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable pjs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the softest, coolest pjs ever! So glad I got them! I typically wear what I call “rags” to bed...old T-shirts and sweatpants or shorts and I was tired of it! These are so comfortable! I have 3 kids and need to look half way presentable when I walk around in my pjs...these are perfect...the shorts aren’t too short and the v neck is not too low. I’m 5’5 115lbs and the small fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Great pajamas. I'm a round bodied girl, hour glass shaped. These fit perfectly and are comfortable to wear and sleep in. I wash by hand because I don't want to give them any opportunity to shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: High shorts but overall okay
customer_reviews.text: So overall it is a good set but the shorts are VERY high waisted which isn’t a big deal as you can roll them but the shirt is short like belly button short although if the pants are up and the shirt is there it looks totally normal I’m just not comfortable with my pants at my waist instead of on my hips. The material and color is great and soft
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to find pajamas that are not hot now that I’m older. These are wonderful. Hardly know I have them on. SO much better than cotton. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Marmie

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in XL because I don’t like to sleep in tight clothes. (I wear a size 8/10 in pants, size 12/14 in tops.) The top fits well and the shorts are big, but not “falling down” big ... just roomy. Sexy, they are not. Comfy? Extremely! I ordered them in black and didn’t experience any of the unpleasant smell others have mentioned (and I’m very sensitive to smells because of previous sinus cancer.) I wash them on cold with other black clothes and hang them to dry. I will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: P. Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable PJ's
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pajamas overall. I washed these twice now on the delicate cycle in the washing machine. I have air dried both times. I think these pj's will hold up well if air dried and washed with similar clothing items. In my opinion these will not hold well up and will get picks on them if they are dried in the dryer or washed in the regular cycle in the washing machine. In the past I just have not had good results with this type of fabric in the dryer. I recommend them if you don't mind air drying.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves these
customer_reviews.text: This is the third color of these pajamas that I've bought for my wife. She loves the fit and the smooth silky bamboo material. I like that they actually look good on her, too. She's never been one to wear actual pajamas until now, so it's a much welcome change from wearing worn old t-shirts and shorts to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable, I love these pajamas . They don’t make me sweat and feels good on my sheets . Definitely want another pair . I wish the shirt wasn’t a vneck though
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Love these pjs.
customer_reviews.text: These pjs are roomy, extremely comfortable to sleep in and launder beautifully. I am very happy with this purchase. I didn't expect the fabric to feel as light weight and soft as it is. The color is bright and pretty. I love the detail of the satin border at hem & neckline.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and staying cool
customer_reviews.text: First off I think these are comfortable, not binding. Not too sure if they really help with staying cooler at night, but they are better than the cotton PJ's I was wearing. They wash really well and I hung them out to dry. I wear size 10-12, so I ordered the large. Who wants tight sleepwear. I will probably order two more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!! I’m buying the Capri set too!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! These are so comfy! Seem to be good quality. I was so excited to go to bed the day they came in the mail 😂 Kept me cool all night (I’m pregnant so this is a must). Loose fitting which is great! I wore a sports bra underneath. Definitely wouldn’t be able to wear with nothing underneath and have company over.
customer_reviews.author: Talburt

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These jammies are amazing! I hate wearing long pants to bed... I move a lot in my sleep & I get tangled in jammy pants... so I wanted a set of jammies with shorts. I'm currently 7 1/2 months pregnant. I ordered these in a size large. They fit well, even a bit on the large side, so I'm confident that I will be able to wear these through the rest of my pregnancy. The fabric is excellent quality & soft to the touch. I washed these jammies before wearing them to bed. They washed well (no pilling, no bleeding of the color). I'm already planning to buy another set in my true size, post-pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: EJM

customer_reviews.title: Fit Is Odd!!
customer_reviews.text: So the fabric is really soft just like any bamboo fabric is. I did stay cool at night as well. The major downside is there is not a front or back in the shorts, so the fit is off. I found that odd. So literally you can wear them either side which is not how we are shaped so I don’t know why they are constructed in this way. The elastic is on the thin side for me also. They looked extremely frumpy on me. I’m 5’5”, post pardum about 195 lbs. I ordered an XL. I could have ordered an Large if it wasn’t for the elastic. If I didn’t already wash them I would have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect period outfit
customer_reviews.text: This is such a comfy outfit. I'm 5'5 about 180..size 14 And the x-large fit perfect and on the baggy side. The fabric is so soft and the shorts have enough elastic for PMS and period belly/bloat
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: They were even more soft and comfortable than I expected
customer_reviews.text: They were even more soft and comfortable than I expected. I'm 5' 6" 135 and the medium is a tad loose, but for sleepwear that was ok. I loved the first set so much I bought a second set! They get softer as you wash them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Arsenis

customer_reviews.title: nice pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium because I saw that it ran small. The medium top is a little large for me but the bottoms fit fine but I've always been smaller on top. Story of my life. They feel nice and look nice. I don't know if they keep me any cooler while sleeping. If you get these be sure to not put in dryer. That surprised me when I went to wash them. I imagine they would shrink. I'll probably by another set when I get paid again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Can't dry in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to dry hanging up and instructions say to iron on low setting. lol Fortunately they don't need ironing, but I sure wish you could dry these. I keep my house at 35% humidity with a dehumidifier, and they don't get dry before bedtime because they're so thick. Otherwise, I would give them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE !
customer_reviews.text: These are The Best Pajamas! They are incredibly soft. They don’t get twisted around my body when I sleep, which is a big plus for me, as I tend to get tangled in everything I sleep in! They look very well made and wash well. I will be purchasing another set and my daughter wants some too! Great product, well worth the money spent! Shipping was fast too. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: bluebug

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Comfy wear and the color is a perfect lavender. The satin edges hold up well after a few washes. I don’t get too warm or too cold with this during the night. I am 5ft 3 in, 130lb and ordered a small. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aakanksha arora

customer_reviews.title: A perfect pajama set
customer_reviews.text: Love these pajamas. I’m a size 6 in misses and am around 5’4” at 143 lbs. you never know when you see reviews how something will fit. The medium fit perfect in these. I received and washed them up immediately. I knew they would be my favorites before I wore them. I’m ordering another set. Super soft and thin with satin trim on the V and the hem of the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Dustybunny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cool PJs
customer_reviews.text: These pjs are comfortable and sized appropriately. I sleep much cooler with these pjs than any previous pjs. Considering purchasing a second set.
customer_reviews.author: L. Oldenburg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these jammies. So cool and breathable (I sleep hot) and cute style. I’m a reliable size 12 so I got the L and I probably could’ve done with the medium shorts but the top is a perfect fit and they’re pajamas, so don’t have to be fitted. I’m not small busted so overall it works. I will be buying some more pairs for myself and others!
customer_reviews.author: Marie73

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set because it had great reviews. The product is very soft and while I’m between a size 4-6, I’m realizing I should have bought the Medium and not Small for more comfort. I will be buying another set in Medium since two pairs of these PJ’s sounds like a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Veester

customer_reviews.title: New favorite pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove these PJs. They are so soft and a perfect comfy fit. The coral color is much more orange than expected, which was a little disappointing, as I prefer the pinkish/red coral pictured. But the color doesn’t matter when it comes to the comfiest PJs ever. I am 5’6” and 130#, the small fits with plenty of room; I can’t wear anything remotely tight to sleep in. Just ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: AmieF07

customer_reviews.title: Size down on the xl
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy love the satin trim and they aren’t too crazy if I have to go check the mail I’m a size 16 42 bust 40 waist the shorts are huge on me and the top is still pretty roomy my advice is size down for these the only con other than that is no pockets but just a bit baggy
customer_reviews.author: Maria is a Jedi

customer_reviews.title: cute and comfy but did not keep me cool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and Femofit brand pj's as I've been waking up sweaty during the night-I'm 47 but I guess its already started :-(. Unfortunately I still wake up soaked in these (the femofit did stay dry through the night). These are probably cuter looking but unfortunately did not serve the specific purpose I purchased them for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ault

customer_reviews.title: I love these PJs so much
customer_reviews.text: I love these PJs so much. I overheat constantly in bed (maybe because I sleep hot, maybe because my partner turns into a brick oven at night...) and these PJs really keep me cool. They’re so soft and light, and also quite elegant. Definitely recommend them for comfort, look, and general quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dmascarenhas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sleepwear!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my stay in the hospital during my knee replacement. They were super soft and very well-made. They fit exactly as expected & were so comfortable. I loved them so much, that I bought four pairs (pink, green, purple & gray). Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jackieali3

customer_reviews.title: So cool, soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these PJs. So soft and comfortable and great if you get hot when you’re sleeping. I used to just sleep in a T-shirt but this is so much better! I just purchased my 3rd pair this summer. I’m 5’3” and have bought medium and medium petite to get the colors I like and I can’t notice any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Arlyne C.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable very cute and I’m going to buy more right nowsuper compft!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5 foot six and I weigh 230 and XL fit very well very comfortable very cute and I’m going to buy more right now!
customer_reviews.author: Karen U

customer_reviews.title: See-through
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, however they are extremely see-through. I would love to have a pair of pajamas that I can walk around the house in and conversation with my family without exposing me. I hope to one day find some pajamas that fit this description.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So ridiculously comfortable to sleep or just lounge in. I'm 5'4 approx 155 lbs and I probably could have ordered the medium instead of large but the large is just a bit baggy on me and doesn't stop these from being the most comfortable pajamas I've ever slept in.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the size guide provided the pajamas fit. I'm a size 12 US and ordered a XL. They were roomy without falling off of my body or making my look ridiculous. Now onto the feel. These pajamas as soft and almost feel like you have nothing on. I wear these around the house and to bed as well as when working out on treadmill. Comfortable! They also dry quickly. Inexpensive and comfortable. Bamboo for the win!
customer_reviews.author: New York Minute

customer_reviews.title: My "sleep like a baby pj's"
customer_reviews.text: I love these pjs! Feel like a dream, so soft against the skin and seem to wick away on some of those hormonal night sweats! My H calls them my "sleep like a baby pjs" as I usually get a great nites sleep when I wear them. I bought the lavender small. I'm 5'4 and 129 lbs. Fit great.
customer_reviews.author: ButterBee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, product as shown (for a change)
customer_reviews.text: After ordering several night wear items from Ekouaer which looked nothing like the picture when they arrived, this pajama set is as shown, is very soft, comfortable, and fits well. I am very happy with this set and will order it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Out Of The Shoot

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These pjs exceeded my expectations. Not only are they very pretty, they are the most comfortable pjs I own. I would highly recommend them for anyone with night sweats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh so cool for night flashes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this looking for something to wear at night that wouldn’t make my night flashes worse. In reality, this pj set made my sleep much better. It is very cool, and I woke up after a good night’s sleep not drenched in sweat. Lovely! I am buying more in different colors!😊
customer_reviews.author: Terese

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable...all day long
customer_reviews.text: I have begun to wear these around the house as a lounging set. They are extremely comfortable. I have even participated in virtual work-related meetings while wearing them. As long as I stay seated, the top looks like a t-shirt. They have also made my night sweats more comfortable. I have 7 sets and am looking for more colors. BTW I put them in the washing machine on delicate and use a drying rack to dry them.
customer_reviews.author: WW

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They just arrived and so far so good! They are a little big, but fine for pjs. I bought these specifically because I get super hot in my sleep. These are definitely cooler than my typical pajamas - I will report back if things change, but seems like these were just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Malice

customer_reviews.title: I suggest buying a size up. I'm 5'1 135 and i love the fit of the Large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than watch wear. I'm a s/m and I ordered a Large. Ordering up is Absolutely the best way to go because it's really elastic and super comfortable fabric that soothes the skin especially if you have scratchy super sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Parent

customer_reviews.title: so soft!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of these pajamas i have ordered. Who knew bamboo could be so soft? The material drapes over me, it doesn't cling or fit tight. It doesn't bunch up when i am sleeping. After wearing my first pair I knew I needed more. I stay comfortable all night in these. I don't get too hot. I used the size chart and ordered XL. I typically wear large sizes but the XL is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie S Garza

product_meta.title: Latuza Women's V-neck Sleepwear Short Sleeve Pajama Set
feature_bullets: Thoughtful petite size is made for 5 ft 2 ½ or around in height. Please follow the recommended size as below: Petite Small=Petite US 4-6, Petite Medium=Petite US 8-10, Petite Large=Petite US 12-14
Top features v-neck collar, short sleeve; Boxer shorts with comfy elastic waist
Wide smooth satin trimmed at the collar and the leg open
Soft and light weight, loose fitting with ease
Washing instruction: Machine wash cold gentle, Do no bleach, Iron low heat, Do not dryclean, Do not tumble dry
